frameset.edef: start over, do over after a break - in F1, the process stops and then starts over. In F3 the process is repeated.

arg.g: the reopening of one of the two areas on the border with Afghanistan

arg.g: after being closed for five months due to the incidents on the Afghani side

example.arg: بعد اقفال ها خمسة اشهر ب سبب حوادث في الجانب الافغاني

arg.g: the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

frameset.edef: repeat, do again - in F1, the process stops and then starts over. In F3 the process is repeated.
